name: Second Player
description:
A game where you play as 2 little characters that have to work together to jump around on a game controller to play video games.

IF THE GAME APPEARS LAGGY TRY DOWNLOADING THE EXE OR RUNNING IN FIREFOX (windows download only sorry)

WASD/Arrow keys to move

Space to Jump

Q/E to swap character

Post Jam Updates

Update 1.1: Fixed game breaking bugs:

- Enemy ships flying off screen

- Platformer levels not restarting properly

Reduced platformer difficulty:

- Reduced some gap sizes, added more backups

- Gain a life at the end of each level

Fixed overlapping music after beating a level

Changed text to green once game has been beaten.

Update 1.2: Improved playability

Actually runs at lower framerates (delta time properly implemented)

Bit of optimisation

Made it a bit easier again

Update 1.3: Removed the hit spikes popup
